DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Price Promotion Use Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._The amount paid, charged, or engaged to be paid, for purchasing goods, services and financial instruments._Encouragement of the progress or growth or acceptance of something._To put into action or service._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
